content: 112 122 132 140 150 sts place the next 38 40 44 49 54 58 63 66 70 75 sts on a holder using the cable cast on co 6 6 6 7 6 8 7 8 8 7 sts k 35 40 45 48 53 56 61 66 70 75 sts 152 172 192 206 224 240 258 280 296 314 sts knit the body continue even in stockinette st until the body is 1 1/2 shorter than your desired length to decide on a length do not hesitate to try the sweater on our model is wearing a cropped version which rests right at the natural waist so decide where you want the sweater to rest and just knit till you are 1 1/2 away from that resting spot then switch to 32 us6 continue in k1 p1 rib until rib is 1 1/2 @2020 caroline hegwer 15 notting hill tubular bind off if you prefer you can also bind off in pattern making sure to keep the bind off loose if you opted for a regular cast on i recommend using a regular bind off we recommend watching the video tutorial link on page 2 round 1 *k1 sl1pwyf repeat from * to end round 2 *sl1pwyb p1 repeat from * to end round 3 same as round 1 round 4 same as round 2 set up cut yarn leaving a tail that is at least 4 times the circumference of your knitting thread tail on darning needle place locking stitch marker on first knit stitch and let it hang in front of your work with tapestry needle go through first stitch as if to knit and drop stitch off left needle skip following stitch which is a purl stitch and insert tapestry needle purlwise through front leg of following stitch pull all the way through place locking stitch marker on front leg of stitch you had skipped and let marker hang on back of your work @2020 caroline hegwer 16 notting hill with darning needle go through stitch you just marked purlwise and drop it off left needle coming from back insert tapestry needle between next 2 stitches catch front leg of stitch on left of darning needle and pull all the way through step 1 slip knit stitch knitwise and take it off left needle skip next stitch and insert darning needle through following stitch purlwise and pull all the way through step 2 take purl stitch off purlwise skip knit stitch coming from back insert darning needle between next two stitches catch front leg of stitch on left of darning needle and bring tapestry needle to back repeat steps 1 and 2 until 2 stitches remain on needle at end of your round last step slide the 2 stitches to other end of knitting needle insert knitting needle through front leg of first marked stitch purlwise remove marker insert knitting needle through front leg of second stitch purlwise remove marker slide stitches to other
